title: Sparkling Floral Diamond Vanki - Modern Day Chettu Bangaru Gajulu
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds. Expertly crafted with a Hyderabadi polish for lasting luster.
features: A contemporary take on the classic Vanki design. Features a floral motif meticulously studded with dazzling CZ diamonds. The openwork design allows light to pass through, enhancing the sparkle. The meticulously detailed floral design is a modern twist on traditional South Indian jewelry.
colors: Predominantly gold with the brilliant white sparkle of the CZ diamonds.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to add a touch of South Indian elegance with a modern flair. Suitable for both traditional and contemporary outfits. Can be worn for functions such as Seemantham or as part of a bridal trousseau.
description: This Vanki seamlessly blends tradition and modernity. The brilliance of the CZ diamonds provides an opulent look at an accessible price point. It offers timeless elegance and makes a memorable statement. Crafted with care in the heart of Hyderabad, ensuring the highest quality and craftsmanship.
